column1:
['\n',

My ambition is to become a DevOps Engineer - I really enjoy maintaining and automating systems. My current role has just progressed more into a DevOps role and I'm learning a lot!

, '\n',

I'm currently learning Python - I try to use this daily to create scripts and I've also used Flask to build this websites backend.

, '\n',

I've also started learning Ansible and Github Actions! Which is going to be implemented into the workflow at my current job.

, '\n']
